description: City: Missoula, MTFrom BBQ to haute cuisine, Burns St. Bistro’s catering service will develop the menu to make your wedding or event even more memorable. The casual charm of our award winning slow-cooked meats and creative, classic sides is the perfect companion to your Montana styled celebration, or draw from our chef’s table of fine dining options, tailored to fit your tastes and budget. Check out a sample menu, but don’t get too attached – all things are subject to change with the seasons around here.On the road our portable slow-cooker, The People’s Pit as we affectionately call it, brings the cooking to your site, while our food service trailer, The Beastro Wagon, is ready to cater or vend at your next reception, party or other event. Our commitment to quality ingredients and the bounty of Montana’s foods brings nothing but the delicious to your table, and our combined thirty years of cooking and service experience ensures a seamless experience for you and your guests.
name: Burns St. Bistro
